example.parse: (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN استبعاد) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC مشاركة) (NP (NOUN_PROP المانيا))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN هجوم)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN العراق)))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: Germany's participation in an attack on Iraq

example.arg: مشاركة المانيا في هجوم على العراق
